talk.utter: If you're using it as an insult, you think it's bad.  That's just how it works.  It cannot be insulting to refer to him as a woman unless you believe women are bad.

talk.author: did:plc:wsrem3jkez5umthiiq4nc3eq
talk.utter: (so stop choosing to think women are bad)
